articles.description: T.J. Henderson's baseline 3-pointer gave IUPUI the lead with 50 seconds left in overtime and Jaylen Minnett then scored his only three points from the line to wrap up the Jaguars' 76-71 victory over Milwaukee on Friday night.
articles.headline: IUPUI tops Milwaukee in overtime, 76-71

articles.description: The Bonnies put an end to the nation's longest winning streak, snapping the Rams' 16-0 run with a 77-74 victory.
articles.headline: St. Bonaventure upsets No. 16 Rhode Island

images.caption: The Bonnies put an end to the nation's longest winning streak, snapping the Rams' 16-0 run with a 77-74 victory.

articles.description: CJ Massinburg had 24 points, 12 rebounds and five assists and Buffalo clinched the Mid-American Conference East Division title on Friday night with a 95-82 win over Bowling Green.
